TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CspParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含傳遞至執行密碼編譯計算之密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 的參數。

span.span: Contains parameters that are passed to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that performs cryptographic computations.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表可傳遞至 managed 密碼編譯類別，在內部使用 Microsoft 密碼編譯服務提供者 (Csp) 從非受控 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 的參數。The class represents parameters that you can pass to managed cryptography classes that internally use Microsoft Cryptographic Service Providers (CSPs) from the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI). 類別名稱結尾為"CryptoServiceProvider"是相對應的 CSP 的 managed 程式碼包裝函式。Classes with names ending in "CryptoServiceProvider" are managed code wrappers for the corresponding CSP. 使用類別來執行下列動作：Use the class to do the following: - 藉由傳遞提供者類型，若要指定特定 CSP或屬性。Specify a particular CSP by passing the provider type to the or property. 您也可以指定使用的建構函式多載的 CSP。You can also specify a CSP using an overload of the constructor. - 建立您可以在其中儲存密碼編譯金鑰的金鑰容器。Create a key container where you can store cryptographic keys. 金鑰容器會提供最安全的方式來保存密碼編譯金鑰，並且不要告訴他人從惡意第三方。Key containers provide the most secure way to persist cryptographic keys and keep them secret from malicious third parties. 如需建立金鑰容器的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 儲存非對稱金鑰在金鑰容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). - 指定是否要建立非對稱簽章金鑰或非對稱交換金鑰使用屬性。Specify whether to create an asymmetric signature key or an asymmetric exchange key using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，使用類別，並將金鑰儲存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用選取智慧卡密碼編譯服務提供者的類別。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 然後簽署並驗證使用智慧卡的資料。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這種初始化欄位值`24`，以指定 PROV_RSA_AES 提供者。This form of initializes the field to a value of `24`, which specifies the PROV_RSA_AES provider. 此預設提供者適用於演算法。This default provider is compatible with the algorithm. 如需其他提供者類型的資訊，請參閱欄位。For information about other provider types, see the field. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，使用類別，並將金鑰儲存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 dwTypeIn) cil managed

param.name: dwTypeIn
param.span: 指定要建立的提供者類型之提供者類型程式碼。

span.span: A provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.

summary.span: 使用指定的提供者類型碼，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified provider type code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式指定的提供者類型所傳遞的數值，表示該提供者。Use the constructor to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者類型：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`1`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`13`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 提供者型別值的詳細資訊，請參閱欄位。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 文件。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，使用類別，並將金鑰儲存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者類型：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`1`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`13`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 提供者型別值的詳細資訊，請參閱欄位。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 文件。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用選取智慧卡密碼編譯服務提供者的類別。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 然後簽署並驗證使用智慧卡的資料。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式指定的提供者類型、 提供者名稱和容器名稱。Use the constructor to specify a provider type, a provider name, and a container name. 您可以擷取該容器內的索引鍵使用的容器名稱。You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container. 藉由傳遞數值，表示所需的提供者型別，指定提供者類型。Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type. WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者類型：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`1`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定與相容的提供者演算法的值傳遞`13`到`dwTypeIn`參數。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 提供者型別值的詳細資訊，請參閱欄位。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 文件。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

Value is not a valid enumeration value.
Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示 的金鑰容器名稱。

span.span: Represents the key container name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來指定您的金鑰容器的名稱。Use the field to specify a name for your key container. 您可以使用容器名稱，以擷取保存的金鑰，該容器內。You can use the container name to retrieve the persisted key within that container. 如需建立金鑰容器的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 儲存非對稱金鑰在金鑰容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，使用類別，並將金鑰儲存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 指定將非對稱金鑰建立為簽章金鑰或交換金鑰。

span.span: Specifies whether an asymmetric key is created as a signature key or an exchange key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會初始化屬性，當您初始化物件物件。The field initializes the property when you initialize a object with a object. 交換金鑰是對稱的金鑰組，用來加密工作階段金鑰，使它們可以安全地儲存並與其他使用者交換。An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 您可以使用值 (`1`) 來指定交換金鑰。You can use the value (`1`) to specify an exchange key. 這個值會對應到`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 簽章金鑰是用來驗證數位簽章的訊息或檔案的非對稱金鑰組。A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating digitally signed messages or files. 您可以使用值 (`2`) 來指定簽章金鑰。You can use the value (`2`) to specify a signature key. 這個值會對應到`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中所使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 根據預設，欄位指定交換金鑰。By default, the field specifies an exchange key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉來指定索引鍵類型物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify a key type for an object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 取得或設定與智慧卡金鑰關聯的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a password associated with a smart card key.

value.span: 與智慧卡金鑰關聯的密碼。

span.span: A password associated with a smart card key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，來提供智慧卡金鑰的密碼。Use the property to supply a password for a smart card key. 當您指定密碼，使用這個屬性時，[密碼] 對話方塊將不會呈現給使用者。When you specify a password using this property, a password dialog box will not be presented to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr ParentWindowHandle { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };
member this.ParentWindowHandle : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定智慧卡密碼對話方塊之 Unmanaged 父視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

value.span: 智慧卡密碼對話方塊父視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: A handle to the parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定智慧卡密碼對話方塊之 unmanaged 的父視窗的控制代碼。Use the property to specify a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box. 當您指定使用這個屬性的控制代碼時，智慧卡密碼對話方塊會呈現給使用者。When you specify a handle using this property, a smart card password dialog box will be presented to the user. 您可以避免呈現藉由明確指定的密碼使用的智慧卡密碼對話方塊屬性。You can avoid presenting a smart card password dialog box by explicitly specifying a password by using the property.

summary.span: 表示 的提供者名稱。

span.span: Represents the provider name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 提供者名稱，請參閱 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 文件，請在 MSDN library，如需詳細資訊。See the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library for details on provider names.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示 的提供者類型代碼。

span.span: Represents the provider type code for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來指定傳遞數值，表示該提供者的提供者類型。Use the field to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義之數字的值，表示預設提供者類型：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定與相容的提供者類別中，將值傳遞`1`。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `1`. - 若要指定與相容的提供者類別中，將值傳遞`13`。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `13`. 下表列出提供者類型和其對應數值 WinCrypt.h 標頭檔中定義。The following table lists the provider types and their corresponding numeric values defined in the WinCrypt.h header file. |提供者類型Provider Type|數字值Numeric Value| |-------------------|-------------------| |`PROV_RSA_FULL`|11| |`PROV_RSA_SIG`|22| |`PROV_DSS`|33| |`PROV_FORTEZZA`|44| |`PROV_MS_EXCHANGE`|55| |`PROV_SSL`|66| |`PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL`|1212| |`PROV_DSS_DH`|1313| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG`|1414| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG`|1515| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL`|1616| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL`|1717| |`PROV_DH_SCHANNEL`|1818| |`PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS`|2020| |`PROV_RNG`|2121| |`PROV_INTEL_SEC`|2222| |`PROV_REPLACE_OWF`|2323| |`PROV_RSA_AES`|2424| 如需有關預設提供者類型和行為的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) 文件。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

span.span: Cryptographic Services
